fields.name: Description
fields.value: Generate an independent manifest for a script, behavior, resource or skin pack

fields.name: Parameters
fields.value:
`pack_type` - Manifest pack type to generate
`pack_name` - The name of the pack
`min_engine_version`: Minimum engine version (Bedrock edition)
`pack_icon` - The pack icon to be included. Only accepts PNG files
`pack_use_metadata` - Also add a metadata field
`pack_authors` - Author names separated by commas. Only included if pack_use_metadata is enabled
`pack_author_url` - Author website. Only included if pack_use_metadata is enabled
`pack_use_gametest` - Also enable the GameTest module
`pack_gametest_entry_file` - Path to the GameTest entry file. Only included if pack_use_gametest is enabled
